txt.en: Complete many quests in the Gladdenmere.
Complete many quests in the Gladdenmere.

Once a beautiful lake, the Gladdenmere was wracked by upheavals during the War of the Last Alliance, and the land all about became a vast marshland, a perilous waste of dark pools and tangled grasses. The Gladdenmere has once again become accessible, but the path that allows curious travellers to reach it also allows passage for dangerous foes who might threaten the Wilderfolk of the Vales....
